list_achievements.title: Unique Destiny
list_achievements.description: Earn 6000 Achievement Points
list_achievements.info: The Unique Destiny PUBG Mobile Achievement is clearly one of the most time consuming and difficult to achieve. In order to get this glorious achievement you will need to earn 6000 Achievement Points. There is no shortcut to complete this achievement, the more achievements you complete the more you will get closer to the Unique Destiny. This achievement will reward you with the "Unique Destiny" title, along with the mythic fiend huntress set (not shown).

list_achievements.title: Commando
list_achievements.description: Complete any 6 of the following:

list_achievements.title: Chicken Expert
list_achievements.description: Win a Solo Classic match in the following ways while in Platinum tier or above.
task_list: Win a Solo Classic match in the following ways while in Platinum tier or above.
Use Assault Rifle to deal the final blow and win a match
Use SMG to deal the final blow and win a match
Use Sniper Rifle to deal the final blow and win a match
Use Shotgun to deal the final blow and win a match
Use Light Machine Gun to deal the final blow and win a match
Use Pistol to deal the final blow and win a match
Use Crossbow to deal the final blow and win a match
Use Melee Weapon to deal the final blow and win a match
Use Throwable to deal the final blow and win a match
Use Vehicle to deal the final below and win a match

list_achievements.description: Complete all the following kills in a Classic match while in Platinum tier or above.

Use any Sniper Rifle to kill an enemy.
Use any Throwable to kill an enemy.
Use any Vehicle to kill an enemy

list_achievements.title: Threat From Above
list_achievements.description: Land in the following locations:
task_list: Vikendi – At the red newspaper stand in Cantra.
Vikendi – At the center of the maze in Dino Park.
Miramar – Inside the Coliseum in Monte Nuevo.
Miramar – At the fountain in Los Leones.
Erangel – Inside the Thickest but hollow pillar in Mylta Power.
Erangel – The end of Novorepnoye Dock.
Sanhok – The thickest column of the Quarry.
Sanhok – The Island in the middle of the river located in the west of Bootcamp.
